Text: Roseville DASH Cc Mark Attached is the latest version of the DASH as of late Friday afternoon I am initialling this version and faxing it to you now so that you will have it on Monday Neither the deal team nor I have any further comments to it but if I learn when I arrive in SF on Monday that any further changes have been made I will review reinitial and send to you I am also tracking down the appendices referenced in the DASH which I have reviewed in earlier draft form Pager No for me on Monday is SF office number is Best regards Karen Original Message From Schneider Chip Sent Friday May PM To Gorte David Parquet David Fillinger Mark Jones Karen E Bills Lisa Clark Catherine Sherman Cris Subject Final DASH for Comment

Roseville DASH Part Here are the attachments Ive asked the commercial guys to make one additional change in the fourth paragraph of Appendix C but thought you might want to see the current state of play Regards Karen
Pastoria Risk MemoHere is my risk memo for the sale of Pastoria to Calpine I also faxed this to you tonight I look forward to our call at your time tomorrow Regards Karen
NW Legal Recruiter Cc me to set up a call with Linda Greene for Monday Would Central time work for everyone Please let Jan know and we will set up a conference callin number Thanks

McCutchen Merger DiscussionsSheila and Mark Harlan talked to me about this news when I was in California last week I view it very positively I worked extensively with several of the Rudnick folks in Chicago and in NY when I was still at VE and was impressed with them at that time I am curious Sheila what your views are because as I recall we used Rudnick in connection with the Midwest peakers Maybe we can all catch a minute to talk when we are in San Antonio for the conference this week Look forward to seeing you both Karen Forwarded by Karen E JonesHOUECT on AM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Harlan Wendell AM Please respond to To Sheila R Tweed Email cc Mark Haedicke Email Karen Jones Email Subject Merger Discussions Sheila I was sorry to hear about your Mom and hope shes all right We missed you last week I mentioned to Karen when I saw her and wanted you and Mark to know that we have begun merger discussions with Piper Marbury Rudnick Wolfe Needless to say theres a lot of talking and tire kicking to do before any deal would be done But we are all intrigued by the possibilities The combined firm would be approximately lawyers with a significant presence over lawyers on each coast and in the midwest We would have over business lawyers with specialties in virtually every area and the number rated real estate development land use and environmental practices in the country What is most exciting to us is that this would be an entirely new national firm Piper Rudnick is itself the product of a merger a year ago between two large regional firms That will give each of the constituents the opportunity to share what is best about their business and culture I believe your group worked with Rudnick Wolfe before they merged with Piper I would be interested in knowing how that went and also any other reactions you Mark or any of your colleagues may have to the merger I will call you about this later today If you and Mark would like to visit with us and Piper jointly to discuss what we are doing I would be pleased to arrange that Harlan

Roseville DASH Contact Info for Karen Cc Mark and Janette Following up on my voicemail looks like Monday will now be the circulation date for the DASH Monday is critical as there is an option for ERCs that has a strike deadline of Tuesday Hopefully we will receive the final DASH today so that I can review the final and fax to Mark tonight or over the weekend Monday I will be in the SF office Assuming my flight is on time I should arrive there around am Pacific time I will be available by pager and the general office number there is Have a great weekend Karen

Roseville DASH Cc Mark Attached is the latest version of the DASH as of late Friday afternoon I am initialling this version and faxing it to you now so that you will have it on Monday Neither the deal team nor I have any further comments to it but if I learn when I arrive in SF on Monday that any further changes have been made I will review reinitial and send to you I am also tracking down the appendices referenced in the DASH which I have reviewed in earlier draft form Pager No for me on Monday is SF office number is Best regards Karen Original Message From Schneider Chip Sent Friday May PM To Gorte David Parquet David Fillinger Mark Jones Karen E Bills Lisa Clark Catherine Sherman Cris Subject Final DASH for Comment

FW PLEASE READhave nothing to report kj Original Message From Enron NRON mailtoIMCEANOTESEnronAnnouncementsCorpEnron NRONcom On Behalf Of Mark Taylor Vice President and General CounselENRON Sent Tuesday June PM To NYMEX Hedge Exemption NRON Subject PLEASE READ To Department ENA Legal From Mark Taylor Date May Vice President and General Counsel Subject Enron North America Corp NYMEX Hedge Exemption Applications We are in the process of preparing applications for position limit exemptio ns for ENAs NYMEX energy commodities futures trading These applications require that ENA represent whether its officers employees owners or agen ts have a power of attorney control or have a financial interest in any relat ed commodity futures account either individually or acting with another pers on pursuant to express or implied agreement Please direct any responses to my paralegal Tana Jones via intercompany email or call her at by the end of business on June if you have any power of attorney control or have a financial interest in any commodity futures account other than an ENA or other trading affiliate account IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A COMMODITY FUTURES ACCOUNT YOU DO NOT NEED TO RESPOND TO THIS REQUEST

FW PLEASE READhave nothing to report kj Original Message From Enron NRON mailtoIMCEANOTESEnronAnnouncementsCorpEnron NRONcom On Behalf Of Mark Taylor Vice President and General CounselENRON Sent Tuesday June PM To NYMEX Hedge Exemption NRON Subject PLEASE READ To Department ENA Legal From Mark Taylor Date May Vice President and General Counsel Subject Enron North America Corp NYMEX Hedge Exemption Applications We are in the process of preparing applications for position limit exemptio ns for ENAs NYMEX energy commodities futures trading These applications require that ENA represent whether its officers employees owners or agen ts have a power of attorney control or have a financial interest in any relat ed commodity futures account either individually or acting with another pers on pursuant to express or implied agreement Please direct any responses to my paralegal Tana Jones via intercompany email or call her at by the end of business on June if you have any power of attorney control or have a financial interest in any commodity futures account other than an ENA or other trading affiliate account IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A COMMODITY FUTURES ACCOUNT YOU DO NOT NEED TO RESPOND TO THIS REQUEST

NEPCo EPC Contract Form Cc Kay Is the rumor really true that you are working on a form EPC contract with NEPCo Would it be appropriate then for me to tell the EECC guys to hold up on massaging their Sand Hills form for our PSCo deal Please let me know Thanks Forwarded by Karen E JonesHOUECT on PM Jeff G Slaughter PM To Karen E CT cc Subject Sandhill EPC Karen EE CC is trying to get a contract together that we would sign with NEPCO I know legal was trying to do the same with some type of std contract What should I do or tell them so no duplication of effort Thanks Jeff Forwarded by Jeff G SlaughterPDXECT on PM Bruce NRONDEVELOPMENT PM To Jeff G CT Mark CT Ed DannhausENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Sandhill EPC Jeff Attached is the latest copy of my EPC on Sandhill I need to find the latest copy of the exhibits there have been some changes from the signed EPC deal Bruce

Re WestLB Cc to you list are the Train contract for Pastoria FAs HRSGs other ancillary equipment and the Train contract for Pastoria agreement in principle with final fullblown contract nearing completion Regards Karen To Kathleen ClarkENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Barton CT Bob CT Stuart CT Scott DieballENRON NRONDEVELOPMENt David K BargainerENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Brian D BartoENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Cheryl CostaENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Peggy CT Karen E CT Dale CT Alan CT cc Sheila CT Roseann NRON Subject WestLB To all As you know Enron is refinancing the equipment we bought through WestLB Ive been asked to compile a list of all the equipment purchased through WestLB and the change orders related to same All I know about is the LM deal with GE with executed change order approximately or pending and the ABB transformer deal with one CO pending Please let me know if you are aware of any others Thanks Kay

Re Standard EPC contract Cc Attached below is the draft form EPC contract costplus like we discussed at our mtgs in SF this week that I sent to Lisa Roseann and Sheila last night Forwarded by Karen E JonesHOUECT on AM Kay NRON AM To David CT cc Herman NRON Roger CT Karen E CT Sheila CT Subject Re Standard EPC contract Karen Jones in Portland and Sheila Tweed have been working on just the same thing so Im forwarding your request to them Kay From David Leboe ECT PM To Kay nron cc Herman NRON Roger CT Subject Standard EPC contract Next week Herman and I will be working on a generic compliant EPC contract Could you forward electronic versions of basic fixed price EPC contract and basic Cost Plus EPC contract Call me if you have any questions Thanks

Re GE consentyou go Its pretty specific to the Pastoria contract but has been blessed by Mike Barnas subject of course to GE getting what they want on a guaranty grrrr Kay NRON AM To Karen E CT cc Subject GE consent Hi Karen Could I get a copy of whatever the latest version is of the GE consent for Pastoria We have a potential deal coming up to move some frames out of TurboPark so I would like to see the current stateoftheare version Thanks Kay

PastoriaKern River Ope SeasonGerald Im the deal lawyer Portland based on our Pastoria power plant development project in California which we are trying to sell to Calpine I understand from Ron Coker and Stephanie Miller that you are handling the legal aspects of the transportation and other arrangements for the gas supply to the project Could we talk sometime today so that I can gain a better understanding of the gas transactions overall and specifically how to deal with them in our purchase agreement with Calpine I could do a call between and your time or or after your time Thanks much Karen

PastoriaKern River Cc Gerald Ron Coker is talking with Stephanie about how to get Kern Rivers approval of substitute security to be put up by Calpine in order to get ENA released Could you send to me and to Ron the current version of the transportation agreement itself which I understand has been negotiated with Kern but wouldnt be executed until later Also is my understanding correct that the firm commitment that ENA would put in place n the th would be accomplished by another amendment to the Precedent Agreement Does a draft of this additional amendment exist If you need to reach me my direct number is and fax is Thanks

Re PastoriaKern River Cc Stephanie Karen Stephanie NRON PM To Karen E CT cc Gerald CT Ron nron Subject Re PastoriaKern River I am having copies made of the base PA and all amendments we have executedreceived We do not have the firm transportation agreement That is a Kern FT tariff agreement that has yet to be produced However it should match the existing pro forma in Kerns FERC tariff All remaining expansion shippers will need to execute a firm transportation agreement at a later date Karen I will fax documents to you ASAP Regards Stephanie Karen E CT PM To Gerald CT cc Stephanie NRON Ron nron Subject PastoriaKern River Hi Gerald Ron Coker is talking with Stephanie about how to get Kern Rivers approval of substitute security to be put up by Calpine in order to get ENA released Could you send to me and to Ron the current version of the transportation agreement itself which I understand has been negotiated with Kern but wouldnt be executed until later Also is my understanding correct that the firm commitment that ENA would put in place n the th would be accomplished by another amendment to the Precedent Agreement Does a draft of this additional amendment exist If you need to reach me my direct number is and fax is Thanks

Pastoria Kern River Cc Just want to confirm for purposes of the schedules to our purchase agreement with Calpine that the only written documents ENA has with Kern river are the Precedent Agreement dated and the amendment thereto dated There was an additional unexecuted amendment included in Stephanies fax to me so I thought I should double check It would be helpful if you could get back to me today Thanks Karen

Pastoria Purchase Agreement Cc folks Im copying you on the latest draft of the purchase sale agreement The Kern River provisions are in Section c on page Basically those say that we assign the Precedent Agreement and Calpine posts credit support by Calpine has to bid in at least what we were going to bid in and if we dont close the sale of the Project to Calpine Calpine can put the transport back to us limited to the volumes we told them to commit to We expect to be negotiating with Calpine today so please let Ron or me know if you have any questions or comments as soon as you can Do you know the status of Calpines efforts with Kern River to post the credit support Thanks Forwarded by Karen E JonesHOUECT on AM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From THOMAS J MOORE LGMCOM PM To cc Subject Pastoria Purchase Agreement Attached is a revised version of Pastoria Purchase Agreement John if you want to talk to Andy over the weekend you can try him at home or on his cell phone Andy says Sunday is somewhat better than Saturday for his schedule reddoc

Stoel Rives Invoicesfolks Marcus Wood recently contacted my about billing matters and told me that Trading has double paid two bills one in the amount of for ENA West Desk Trading and in the amount of for ENA California Power Matters perhaps this one is actually Sanders related Could one of you please contact Marcus and let him know if you want the amounts refunded or applied to any particular unpaid matters Thanks
